short_summary: for a water well and potable water system
description: parks Canada is seeking a contractor to drill a water well and construct a potable water system at the Silverhorn Campground in Banff National Park
duration_in_months: For the purposes of this project, the contractor will only be responsible for constructing various elements of the potable water system including but not limited to drilling and constructing a shallow water well, pouring a concrete slab to support a treatment facility, supplying a potable water storage tank and greywater storage tank. The water well must be drilled by June 2nd 2023, the remaining work must be completed by June 30th 2023.
